headline: Is Federal Realty (FRT) Offering Value After A 44.2% Five Year Share Price Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether Federal Realty Investment Trust is attractively priced today, the key question is how its current share price lines up with its underlying fundamentals. The stock last closed at US$101.80, with returns of 1.7% over 30 days, 2.8% year to date and 44.2% over 5 years. These figures can influence how the market is weighing its growth potential and risk profile. Recent coverage has focused on Federal Realty Investment Trust as a long established real estate investment...

headline: Why Analysts See Federal Realty Investment Trust (FRT) Differently As Peak Retail Conditions Emerge
summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust’s latest fair value estimate has edged from about US$110.39 to about US$112.13, with analysts fine tuning their models after a period of mixed but broadly constructive research updates. Small tweaks to inputs such as the discount rate, now about 8.08%, and revenue growth assumptions, now about 4.58%, reflect a view that conditions for shopping center REITs may be near a peak while still supporting a modestly higher valuation range. As the narrative around...
